original_title: Cruce Postal: Del Otro Nuevo Viaje
overview: Postcards of urban landscapes, words reconstructed, framed and reframed. Juxtapositions, tracings, paintings. The hands manipulate the objects, seek their second life from the images/words, according to the layers of memory. «Don't let my memories be stolen (….) Geography is history».
title: Cruce Postal: Del Otro Nuevo Viaje
